title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 March 2015 - XWiki

13:55 <lucaa> hey guys, I just had a funny idea... why wouldn't DocumentReference have it's own serialization functions, that don't need context? The "default" one that serializes everything and the local one that serializes without the wiki prefix  
13:56 <lucaa> it could be really helpful in some situations when you need to compare a string serialization with a document reference and you're not really so willing to get a context / component manager so that you can have a serializer...  
15:37 <cjd> +1 thought about that for a while  
15:38 <cjd> they can also self-parse if you know the entire path (including wiki)
